name: Totem God
description:
You're a god, and your belivers need you - a meteor storm is here. Protecting your believers from meteors is your job-you take em on with your head-that hurts you. Your belivers send prayers to heal you, but in order to hear their prayers, you need to get close to them-and by accident, you might kill your belivers.

Will you be a merciful god who saves, or the violent one, killing everyone?

Adam Rogowski - created everything here.
